<h1>antd-table-editable</h1>
A editable table based on antd table

## Introduction

Antd Editable Table

## Usage

### Install

```bash
npm i antd-table-editable
// or
yarn add antd-table-editable
// or
pnpm add antd-table-editable
```

### Docs

[docs](https://linxianxi.github.io/antd-table-editable/)
